Summary: Two huge stars with a red orb in the middle , all lights were blinding bright
divs: sighting detailsi was on my way to work same time i always go at 6:15 am. i was heading south on treat blvd from concord to walnut creek ca. i was at the traffic light at treat and clayton rd when i first noticed it to the south west of my position. it was shining through some pine trees so i thought it was a plane or a street light at first. as i got up to the highest point on treat blvd that's when i noticed it was neither of my first thoughts. the thing that caught my attention to it was how brilliantly blinding the lights on it was. i've seen planes flying at me with the fog\landing light and i was absolutely certain it was not that.when i got to the top of treat blvd there was a clearing from the trees and houses and i could see the lights clearly. it looked like two huge white stars with a red dot or orb in the middle that was slightly lower. the thing that made me notice it is that i drive that way every day same time and roughly the same darkness and it was almost blinding to look at it. it made the other stars look dull and the size was twice as big as any star in the sky.plus how close they were to each other didn't even look natural. just looking at it was captivating and i almost drove my car off the road. when i pulled over is when i could tell for sure that it was stationary. there was a helicopter to the left of it over the freeway doing the morning traffic report walnut creek so i know it was not that. i live by the navel weapon station in concord and see them practice military helicopter flights once in a while it wasn't that either. something about it was different then the normal military planes i see (i'm up to date on the new vehicles because i like that kind of stuff). i tried to drive closer to take a picture but lost it behind some houses (biggest regret of my life) and i didn't have time to turn around. when i got to work i talked to my manager and he saw it while he was driving to work on the free way and got a look from a different angle. described the same thing i saw. this is something i've never seen before and i can't get it out of my mind. don't know what it was but i thought i would submit this in case anyone else saw it.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Concord
There were no other sightings in Concord on or around March 26th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
